26 | USA | queer
Always looking to chat about: Student Affairs, anthropology, art, video games, kpop, indie & hard rock, LGBTQ+ issues

Still learning the ropes of accessibility on Mastadon, so lmk how I can improve.

name: You can call me
value: CZ, Kiddo, Sourpatch; prefer masculine or gender neutral compliments unless it is specific to body characteristics (i.e. "nice fat ass" or "pretty eyes")

name: Boundaries
value: my ids are not up for debate, we give people space to explain themselves, I have the right to revoke access to me
